0: AN ACT RECOGNIZING JANUARY 26 OF EVERY YEAR AS OBSERVANCE OF THE ANNIVERSARY OF THE FIRST QUARTER STORM, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
principal-authors: ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.; TINIO, ANTONIO L.; CASTRO, FRANCE L.; CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B.;
status: Pending with the Committee on HIGHER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION since 2018-09-24
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08271
FULL TITLE : AN ACT RECOGNIZING JANUARY 26 OF EVERY YEAR AS OBSERVANCE OF THE ANNIVERSARY OF THE FIRST QUARTER STORM, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
ABSTRACT : Seeks to give a chance for every citizen to look back to the past and learn the lessons from the nightmare of the Marcos regime and to honor the youths who fought to revive democracy and to defend the rights and liberties of the Filipino people. Aims to revive the First Quarter Storm which is a continuous movement initiated by youth and other advocates to combat tyrannical rule and authoritarianism.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ELAGO, SARAH JANE I., TINIO, ANTONIO L., CASTRO, FRANCE L., CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B.
DATE FILED : 2018-09-20
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Sy-Alvarado (000 2018-11-19)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HIGHER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION ON 2018-09-24
